name: BetterSales

name: Covergen AI
description: An AI powered tool that helps Upwork freelancers generate personalized cover letters in seconds by analyzing job postings and profiles.

name: MCP WorkDesk
description: A work order management system designed for small businesses with seamless MCP integration.
longDescription:
A work order management system designed for small businesses with seamless MCP integration. Helps create, track, and assign tasks efficiently while leveraging MCP tools for streamlined operations.

Built with Python, Flask, React, and SQLite for a secure and scalable workflow.

Completion Date: Dec 13, 2025

name: XopsLab
description: A global open source community empowering AI and Cloud Native enthusiasts to connect, learn, build, and grow together.

name: Shobdopath AI
description: A sophisticated, AI-driven EdTech platform designed to bridge the language gap for non-native speakers.
longDescription:
Shobdopath is a sophisticated, AI-driven EdTech platform designed to bridge the language gap for non-native speakers. Built on a modular architecture, the system leverages Large Language Models (LLMs) and Multi-Agent Systems to provide a personalized, interactive, and contextual learning experience.

Core Ecosystem Features:

1. Word Explorer (Lexical Intelligence)
A deep-dive tool for vocabulary mastery. Instead of simple translations, it provides a 360-degree view of language: Contextual Analytics, Localization, and Grammar Insights.

2. Language Games (Gamified Mastery)
Moving beyond rote memorization, this module uses gamification to strengthen mental word networks: Word Association, Tiered Vocab Builder, and Anagram Solver.

3. Reading Assistant (Intelligent Comprehension)
An advanced tool designed to break down complex literature, academic texts, or news: Language Simplification, Strategic Summarization, and Keyword Extraction.

Tech Stack:
Frontend: Streamlit
AI Orchestration: LangChain
Core Intelligence: Gemini API
Agent Framework: CrewAI

Completion Date: Dec 15, 2025

name: FeedbackSynthesizer
description: An AI tool that helps teams manage scattered customer feedback from platforms like Intercom, emails, Discord, and app reviews.
longDescription:
An AI tool that helps teams manage scattered customer feedback from platforms like Intercom, emails, Discord, and app reviews. It cleans and categorizes feedback into bugs, feature requests, and UX issues, then highlights the top 3 requested features to help teams prioritize improvements quickly.

Built with Crew AI for workflow, LLM for smart analysis, and Flask for the dashboard and API.

Completion Date: Dec 9, 2025
